GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
mmc: vub300: fix warning - do not call blocking ops when !TASK_RUNNING

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 32d5af247d4de6a35769ca1d027480a37c28fd0c, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 88095e7b473a3d9ec3b9c60429576e9cbd327c89. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mmc: vub300: fix warning - do not call blocking ops when !TASK_RUNNING
OSV.details:
